00005 #ifndef SysMatwrapper_H_
00006 #define SysMatwrapper_H_
00007 #include "mvmd.h" 
00008 #include "GPRS_Matrix.h"
00009 
00010 template < class Mat11, class Mat12, class Mat21, class Mat22 >
00011 class SysMatwrapper : public GPRS_Matrix
00012 {
00013 public:
00014         
00015         SysMatwrapper(Mat11* mRRJ_, Mat12* mRFJ_, Mat21* mFRJ_, Mat22* mFFJ_);
00016         ~SysMatwrapper();
00017 
00018         void calcSize();
00019         MV_Vector_double& operator * ( MV_Vector_double& v) const;
00020 
00021         Mat11* mRRJ;
00022         Mat12* mRFJ;
00023         Mat21* mFRJ;
00024         Mat22* mFFJ;
00025 
00026         int nResEqn;            // number of reservoir equations
00027         int nWellEqn;           // number of well equations
00028 };
00029 
00030 template < class Mat11, class Mat12, class Mat21, class Mat22 >  
00031 SysMatwrapper< Mat11, Mat12, Mat21, Mat22 >::
00032 SysMatwrapper(Mat11* mRRJ_, Mat12* mRFJ_, Mat21* mFRJ_, Mat22* mFFJ_)
00033 {
00034         mMatType = WRAPPER;
00035 
00036         mRRJ = mRRJ_;
00037         mRFJ = mRFJ_;
00038         mFRJ = mFRJ_;
00039         mFFJ = mFFJ_;
00040 
00041         nResEqn  = mRRJ->getnRows();
00042         //nWellEqn = mFFJ->getnRows();
00043         nWellEqn = mFRJ->getnRows();
00044         nRows = nCols = nResEqn + nWellEqn;
00045         y = new double[nRows];
00046         vecY = new MV_Vector_double(y, nRows, MV_Vector_::ref_type(1));
00047 }
00048 
00049 template < class Mat11, class Mat12, class Mat21, class Mat22 >  
00050 SysMatwrapper< Mat11, Mat12, Mat21, Mat22 >::
00051 ~SysMatwrapper()
00052 {
00053         delete[] y;
00054         delete vecY;
00055 }
00056 
00057 template < class Mat11, class Mat12, class Mat21, class Mat22 >  
00058 void SysMatwrapper< Mat11, Mat12, Mat21, Mat22 >::calcSize()
00059 {
00060         int old_nRows = nRows;
00061         nResEqn  = mRRJ->getnRows();
00062         nWellEqn = mFRJ->getnRows();
00063         nRows = nCols = nResEqn + nWellEqn;
00064         if(nRows != old_nRows)
00065         {
00066                 delete[] y;
00067                 delete vecY;    
00068                 y = new double[nRows];
00069                 vecY = new MV_Vector_double(y, nRows, MV_Vector_::ref_type(1));
00070         }
00071 }
00072 
00073 template < class Mat11, class Mat12, class Mat21, class Mat22 >  
00074 MV_Vector_double& SysMatwrapper< Mat11, Mat12, Mat21, Mat22 >::
00075 operator * ( MV_Vector_double& v) const
00076 {
00077         double *rhs = &v(0);                            // find the start postion 
00078 
00079         MV_Vector_double X_res(rhs, nResEqn, MV_Vector_::ref_type(1));
00080         MV_Vector_double X_fac(rhs+nResEqn, nWellEqn, MV_Vector_::ref_type(1));
00081         MV_Vector_double Y_res(y, nResEqn, MV_Vector_::ref_type(1));
00082         MV_Vector_double Y_fac(y+nResEqn, nWellEqn, MV_Vector_::ref_type(1));
00083 
00084         Y_res = (*mRRJ)*X_res + (*mRFJ)*X_fac;
00085         Y_fac = (*mFRJ)*X_res + (*mFFJ)*X_fac;
00086 
00087         return *vecY;
00088 }
00089 #endif // #ifndef SysMatwrapper_H_
